Unlike fsync, setting this parameter to off does not create any risk of database inconsistency: an operating system or database crash might result in some recent allegedly-committed transactions being lost, but the database state will be just the same as if those transactions had been aborted cleanly. So, turning synchronous_commit off can be a useful alternative when performance is more important than exact certainty about the durability of a transaction. For more discussion see Section 29.3.
trans-unit.target: 指定在命令向客户端返回“成功”指示之前，事务提交是否将等待WAL记录写入磁盘。有效值为 on ， remote_apply ， remote_write ， local 和 off 。默认的，安全的，设定 on 。如果 off ，则在向客户端报告成功与真正确保事务安全以防止服务器崩溃之间可能会有延迟。 （最大延迟是wal_writer_delay的三倍。）与fsync不同，将此参数设置为 off 不会造成数据库不一致的任何风险：操作系统或数据库崩溃可能会导致一些最近据称已提交的事务丢失，但是数据库状态将与这些事务被彻底中止的状态相同。因此，当性能比确定事务的持久性更重要时，关闭 synchronous_commit 可能是一个有用的选择。有关更多讨论，请参见29.3节。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which conflicts ON CONFLICT takes the alternative action on by choosing arbiter indexes. Either performs unique index inference, or names a constraint explicitly. For ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING, it is optional to specify a conflict_target; when omitted, conflicts with all usable constraints (and unique indexes) are handled. For ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE, a conflict_targetmust be provided.
trans-unit.target: 通过选择仲裁者索引，指定 ON CONFLICT 采取哪种冲突。执行唯一索引推断，或显式命名约束。对于 ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING ，指定 conflict_target 目标是可选的；如果省略，则处理与所有可用约束（和唯一索引）的冲突。对于 ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE ，必须提供一个 conflict_target 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which database name(s) this record matches. The value all specifies that it matches all databases. The value sameuser specifies that the record matches if the requested database has the same name as the requested user. The value samerole specifies that the requested user must be a member of the role with the same name as the requested database. (samegroup is an obsolete but still accepted spelling of samerole.) Superusers are not considered to be members of a role for the purposes of samerole unless they are explicitly members of the role, directly or indirectly, and not just by virtue of being a superuser. The value replication specifies that the record matches if a physical replication connection is requested (note that replication connections do not specify any particular database). Otherwise, this is the name of a specific PostgreSQL database. Multiple database names can be supplied by separating them with commas. A separate file containing database names can be specified by preceding the file name with @.
trans-unit.target: 指定此记录匹配的数据库名称。值 all 指定它与所有数据库匹配。值 sameuser 指定如果请求的数据库具有与请求的用户相同的名称，则记录匹配。值 samerole 指定所请求的用户必须是与所请求的数据库同名的角色成员。 （ samegroup 是的过时，但仍然接受的拼写 samerole 。）超级用户不被认为是为以下目的一个角色的成员 samerole 只是由于是超级用户，除非它们是明确的角色的成员直接或间接地，并且不。价值 replication 指定如果请求物理复制连接，则记录匹配（请注意，复制连接未指定任何特定的数据库）。否则，这是特定PostgreSQL数据库的名称。可以使用逗号分隔多个数据库名称。可以通过在文件名前面加上 @ 来指定包含数据库名称的单独文件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which database user name(s) this record matches. The value all specifies that it matches all users. Otherwise, this is either the name of a specific database user, or a group name preceded by +. (Recall that there is no real distinction between users and groups in PostgreSQL; a + mark really means “match any of the roles that are directly or indirectly members of this role”, while a name without a + mark matches only that specific role.) For this purpose, a superuser is only considered to be a member of a role if they are explicitly a member of the role, directly or indirectly, and not just by virtue of being a superuser. Multiple user names can be supplied by separating them with commas. A separate file containing user names can be specified by preceding the file name with @.
trans-unit.target: 指定此记录匹配的数据库用户名。值 all 指定它与所有用户匹配。否则，它可以是特定数据库用户的名称，也可以是 + 开头的组名。 （回想一下，PostgreSQL中的用户和组之间没有真正的区别； + 标记实际上意味着“匹配直接或间接地成为该角色成员的任何角色”，而名称中没有 + 标记仅与该特定角色匹配。）为此，只有超级用户直接或间接显式地是角色的成员，而不仅仅是凭借超级用户，才将其视为角色的成员。可以使用逗号分隔多个用户名。可以在文件名前面加上 @ 来指定包含用户名的单独文件。

trans-unit.source: Specify an additional include path, used to find files included via EXEC SQL INCLUDE. Defaults are . (current directory), /usr/local/include, the PostgreSQL include directory which is defined at compile time (default: /usr/local/pgsql/include), and /usr/include, in that order.
trans-unit.target: 指定其他包含路径，用于查找通过 EXEC SQL INCLUDE 包含的文件。默认值为 . （当前目录）， /usr/local/include ，PostgreSQL包含目录（在编译时定义）（默认值： /usr/local/pgsql/include ）和 /usr/include （按此顺序）。

trans-unit.source: Specify format of the archive. It is not necessary to specify the format, since pg_restore will determine the format automatically. If specified, it can be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 指定归档的格式,不需要指定格式,因为pg_restore会自动确定格式。不需要指定格式,因为pg_restore会自动确定格式。如果指定了格式,可以是以下格式之一。

trans-unit.source: Specify output file for generated script, or for the listing when used with -l. Use - for stdout.
trans-unit.target: 为生成的脚本或与 -l 一起使用的列表指定输出文件。用途 - 用于标准输出。

trans-unit.source: Specify that the policy is to be created as a permissive policy. All permissive policies which are applicable to a given query will be combined together using the Boolean “OR” operator. By creating permissive policies, administrators can add to the set of records which can be accessed. Policies are permissive by default.
trans-unit.target: 指定该策略将被创建为许可策略。适用于给定查询的所有宽松策略都将使用布尔“或”运算符组合在一起。通过创建许可策略，管理员可以将记录添加到可以访问的记录集中。默认情况下，策略是允许的。

trans-unit.source: Specify that the policy is to be created as a restrictive policy. All restrictive policies which are applicable to a given query will be combined together using the Boolean “AND” operator. By creating restrictive policies, administrators can reduce the set of records which can be accessed as all restrictive policies must be passed for each record.
trans-unit.target: 指定该策略将被创建为限制性策略。适用于给定查询的所有限制性策略将使用布尔值“ AND”运算符组合在一起。通过创建限制性策略，管理员可以减少可访问的记录集，因为必须为每个记录传递所有限制性策略。

trans-unit.source: Specify the compression level to use. Zero means no compression. For the custom archive format, this specifies compression of individual table-data segments, and the default is to compress at a moderate level. For plain text output, setting a nonzero compression level causes the entire output file to be compressed, as though it had been fed through gzip; but the default is not to compress. The tar archive format currently does not support compression at all.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的压缩级别。零表示不压缩。对于自定义存档格式,这指定了单个表数据段的压缩,默认为以中等水平压缩。对于纯文本输出,设置非零的压缩级别会导致整个输出文件被压缩,就像通过 gzip 送入一样;但默认情况是不压缩。目前,tar 存档格式完全不支持压缩。

trans-unit.source: Specify the maximum size of WAL files that replication slots are allowed to retain in the pg_wal directory at checkpoint time. If max_slot_wal_keep_size is -1 (the default), replication slots may retain an unlimited amount of WAL files. Otherwise, if restart_lsn of a replication slot falls behind the current LSN by more than the given size, the standby using the slot may no longer be able to continue replication due to removal of required WAL files. You can see the WAL availability of replication slots in pg_replication_slots.
trans-unit.target: 指定在检查点时间允许复制插槽保留在 pg_wal 目录中的WAL文件的最大大小。如果 max_slot_wal_keep_size 为-1（默认值），则复制插槽可能会保留无限数量的WAL文件。否则，如果复制插槽的restart_lsn落后于当前LSN超过给定大小，则由于删除了所需的WAL文件，使用该插槽的备用数据库可能不再能够继续复制。您可以在pg_replication_slots中看到复制插槽的WAL可用性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output format, which can be TEXT, XML, JSON, or YAML. Non-text output contains the same information as the text output format, but is easier for programs to parse. This parameter defaults to TEXT.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出格式，可以是TEXT，XML，JSON或YAML。非文本输出包含与文本输出格式相同的信息，但程序更易于解析。此参数默认为 TEXT 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the parallel degree of parallel vacuum. This allows the vacuum to leverage multiple CPUs to process indexes. See VACUUM.
trans-unit.target: 指定平行真空度的平行度。这允许真空利用多个CPU来处理索引。参见VACUUM。

trans-unit.source: Specify the superuser user name to use when disabling triggers. This is relevant only if --disable-triggers is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定禁用触发器时要使用的超级用户名。仅在使用 --disable-triggers 时才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Specify the superuser user name to use when disabling triggers. This is relevant only if --disable-triggers is used. (Usually, it's better to leave this out, and instead start the resulting script as superuser.)
trans-unit.target: 指定禁用触发器时要使用的超级用户名。仅在使用 --disable-triggers 时才有意义。（通常，最好不要这样做，而是以超级用户身份启动生成的脚本。）

trans-unit.source: Specifying a savepoint name that has not been established is an error.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个尚未建立的保存点名称是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a savepoint name that was not previously defined is an error.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个之前没有定义的保存点名称是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Specifying an empty string will also set the password to null, but that was not the case before PostgreSQL version 10. In earlier versions, an empty string could be used, or not, depending on the authentication method and the exact version, and libpq would refuse to use it in any case. To avoid the ambiguity, specifying an empty string should be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个空字符串也会将密码设置为空,但在PostgreSQL版本10之前并不是这样的。在早期的版本中,空字符串可以使用,也可以不使用,这取决于验证方法和确切的版本,libpq在任何情况下都会拒绝使用它。为了避免歧义,应该避免指定一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifying an interval of 0 disables issuing fsync() calls altogether, while still reporting progress to the server. In this case, data could be lost in the event of a crash.
trans-unit.target: 将间隔指定为 0 会禁用发出 fsync() 调用，同时仍向服务器报告进度。在这种情况下，如果发生崩溃，数据可能会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Specifying any of dbname, username, host or port as - is equivalent to omitting that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将 dbname ， username ， host 或 port 中的任何一个指定为 - 等同于省略该参数。

trans-unit.source: Specifying that another table's column REFERENCES cities(name) would allow the other table to contain city names, but not capital names. There is no good workaround for this case.
trans-unit.target: 指定另一个表的列 REFERENCES cities(name) city （name）将允许另一个表包含城市名称，但不能包含大写名称。在这种情况下，没有好的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: Split qualified_identifier into an array of identifiers, removing any quoting of individual identifiers. By default, extra characters after the last identifier are considered an error; but if the second parameter is false, then such extra characters are ignored. (This behavior is useful for parsing names for objects like functions.) Note that this function does not truncate over-length identifiers. If you want truncation you can cast the result to name[].
trans-unit.target: 将 qualified_identifier 拆分为一个标识符数组，删除单个标识符的所有引号。默认情况下，最后一个标识符之后的多余字符被认为是错误；但是，如果第二个参数为 false ，那么将忽略这些额外的字符。（此行为对于解析函数之类的对象的名称很有用。）请注意，此函数不会截断超长标识符。如果要截断，可以将结果强制转换为 name[] 。

trans-unit.source: Split string on delimiter and return the given field (counting from one)
trans-unit.target: 在 delimiter 上分割 string 并返回给定的字段（从1开始计数）

trans-unit.source: Split string using a POSIX regular expression as the delimiter. See Section 9.7.3 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用POSIX正则表达式作为分隔符分割 string 。有关更多信息，请参见第9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Splits qualified_identifier into an array of identifiers, removing any quoting of individual identifiers. By default, extra characters after the last identifier are considered an error; but if the second parameter is false, then such extra characters are ignored. (This behavior is useful for parsing names for objects like functions.) Note that this function does not truncate over-length identifiers. If you want truncation you can cast the result to name[].
trans-unit.target: 将 qualified_identifier 拆分为一个标识符数组，删除单个标识符的所有引号。默认情况下，最后一个标识符之后的多余字符被认为是错误；但是，如果第二个参数为 false ，那么将忽略这些额外的字符。（此行为对于解析函数之类的对象的名称很有用。）请注意，此函数不会截断超长标识符。如果要截断，可以将结果强制转换为 name[] 。

trans-unit.source: Splits string at occurrences of delimiter and returns the n'th field (counting from one).
trans-unit.target: 在出现 delimiter 分割 string ，并返回第 n 个字段（从1开始计数）。

trans-unit.source: Splits string using a POSIX regular expression as the delimiter; see Section 9.7.3.
trans-unit.target: 使用POSIX正则表达式作为分隔符来分割 string ；见9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string at occurrences of delimiter and forms the remaining data into a text array. If delimiter is NULL, each character in the string will become a separate element in the array. If delimiter is an empty string, then the string is treated as a single field. If null_string is supplied and is not NULL, fields matching that string are converted to NULL entries.
trans-unit.target: 在出现 delimiter 将 string 拆分，并将剩余数据形成一个 text 数组。如果 delimiter 为 NULL ，则 string 每个字符将成为数组中的单独元素。如果 delimiter 为空字符串，则将该 string 视为单个字段。如果提供了 null_string 而不是 NULL ，则与该字符串匹配的字段将转换为 NULL 条目。

trans-unit.source: Square brackets ([]) are used for array access.
trans-unit.target: 方括号（ [] ）用于数组访问。

trans-unit.source: Square root
trans-unit.target: 平方根

trans-unit.source: Standard Generalized Markup Language
trans-unit.target: 标准通用标记语言

trans-unit.source: Standard Unix Tools
trans-unit.target: 标准Unix工具

trans-unit.source: Standard Usage:
trans-unit.target: 标准用途。

trans-unit.source: Standby (server)
trans-unit.target: 备用(服务器)

trans-unit.source: Standby mode is exited and the server switches to normal operation when pg_ctl promote is run or a trigger file is found (promote_trigger_file). Before failover, any WAL immediately available in the archive or in pg_wal will be restored, but no attempt is made to connect to the master.
trans-unit.target: 当运行 pg_ctl promote promote_trigger_file 或找到触发文件（promot_trigger_file）时，将退出待机模式，并且服务器将切换到正常操作。在故障转移之前，将立即恢复归档或 pg_wal 中任何可用的WAL ，但不会尝试连接到主服务器。

trans-unit.source: Standby mode is exited and the server switches to normal operation when pg_ctl promote is run, pg_promote() is called, or a trigger file is found (promote_trigger_file). Before failover, any WAL immediately available in the archive or in pg_wal will be restored, but no attempt is made to connect to the master.
trans-unit.target: 当运行 pg_ctl promote pg_promote() ，调用pg_promote（）或找到触发文件（ promote_trigger_file ）时，将退出待机模式，并且服务器将切换至正常操作。在故障转移之前，将立即恢复归档或 pg_wal 中所有可用的WAL ，但不会尝试连接到主服务器。

trans-unit.source: Star symbols can also be quantified to restrict how many labels they can match:
trans-unit.target: 星形符号也可以被量化,以限制它们可以匹配多少个标签。

trans-unit.source: Start or restart an index scan, possibly with new scan keys. (To restart using previously-passed keys, NULL is passed for keys and/or orderbys.) Note that it is not allowed for the number of keys or order-by operators to be larger than what was passed to ambeginscan. In practice the restart feature is used when a new outer tuple is selected by a nested-loop join and so a new key comparison value is needed, but the scan key structure remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 启动或重新启动索引扫描，可能使用新的扫描键。 （要使用先前传递的键重新启动，请为 keys 和/或 orderbys 传递NULL 。）请注意，键或order-by运算符的数量不得大于传递给 ambeginscan 的数量。实际上，当通过嵌套循环联接选择新的外部元组时，使用重新启动功能，因此需要新的密钥比较值，但是扫描密钥结构保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Start reading at the specified log segment file. This implicitly determines the path in which files will be searched for, and the timeline to use.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的日志段文件开始读取。这隐含地决定了搜索文件的路径和使用的时间轴。

trans-unit.source: Start the database server, again using the special database user account:
trans-unit.target: 启动数据库服务器,同样使用特殊的数据库用户账号。

trans-unit.source: Start the server. The server will go into recovery mode and proceed to read through the archived WAL files it needs. Should the recovery be terminated because of an external error, the server can simply be restarted and it will continue recovery. Upon completion of the recovery process, the server will remove recovery.signal (to prevent accidentally re-entering recovery mode later) and then commence normal database operations.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器。服务器将进入恢复模式，并继续读取所需的已归档WAL文件。如果恢复由于外部错误而终止，则只需重启服务器即可继续恢复。恢复过程完成后，服务器将删除 recovery.signal （以防止以后意外重新进入恢复模式），然后开始正常的数据库操作。

trans-unit.source: Start type of the system service. start-type can be auto, or demand, or the first letter of one of these two. If this option is omitted, auto is the default.
trans-unit.target: 系统服务的启动类型。 start-type 可以是 auto ，或 demand 或这两个中的一个的首字母。如果省略此选项，则默认为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: Start value of the sequence
trans-unit.target: 序列的起始值

trans-unit.source: Starting the Database Server
trans-unit.target: 启动数据库服务器

trans-unit.source: Starting the Database Server: Client Connection Problems
trans-unit.target: 启动数据库服务器。客户端连接问题

trans-unit.source: Starting the Database Server: Server Start-up Failures
trans-unit.target: 启动数据库服务器。服务器启动失败

trans-unit.source: Starting the Server
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器

trans-unit.source: Starting with PostgreSQL version 9.0, you can use streaming replication (see Section 26.2.5) to achieve the same benefits with less effort.
trans-unit.target: 从PostgreSQL 9.0版本开始，您可以使用流复制（请参见第26.2.5节）以更少的努力获得相同的好处。

trans-unit.source: State code: i = initialize, d = data is being copied, s = synchronized, r = ready (normal replication)
trans-unit.target: 状态代码： i =初始化， d =正在复制数据， s =已同步， r =准备就绪（正常复制）

trans-unit.source: Statement-Based Replication Middleware
trans-unit.target: 基于语句的复制中间件

trans-unit.source: Statement-level
trans-unit.target: Statement-level

trans-unit.source: Statement-level triggers on a view are fired only if the action on the view is handled by a row-level INSTEAD OF trigger. If the action is handled by an INSTEAD rule, then whatever statements are emitted by the rule are executed in place of the original statement naming the view, so that the triggers that will be fired are those on tables named in the replacement statements. Similarly, if the view is automatically updatable, then the action is handled by automatically rewriting the statement into an action on the view's base table, so that the base table's statement-level triggers are the ones that are fired.
trans-unit.target: 仅当视图上的操作由行级 INSTEAD OF 触发器处理时，才会触发视图上的语句级触发器。如果操作是由 INSTEAD 规则处理的，则将执行规则发出的任何语句来代替命名视图的原始语句，因此将触发的触发器是替换语句中命名的表上的触发器。同样，如果视图是可自动更新的，则通过将语句自动重写为视图基表上的操作来处理该操作，以便基表的语句级触发器是被触发的触发器。

trans-unit.source: Statements are executed more quickly in a transaction block, because transaction start/commit requires significant CPU and disk activity. Execution of multiple statements inside a transaction is also useful to ensure consistency when making several related changes: other sessions will be unable to see the intermediate states wherein not all the related updates have been done.
trans-unit.target: 语句在事务块中的执行速度更快,因为事务启动/提交需要大量的CPU和磁盘活动。在一个事务中执行多条语句也是有用的,以确保在进行几个相关的更改时的一致性:其他会话将无法看到没有完成所有相关更新的中间状态。

trans-unit.source: Statements that contain simple syntax errors are not logged even by the log_statement = all setting, because the log message is emitted only after basic parsing has been done to determine the statement type. In the case of extended query protocol, this setting likewise does not log statements that fail before the Execute phase (i.e., during parse analysis or planning). Set log_min_error_statement to ERROR (or lower) to log such statements.
trans-unit.target: 即使 log_statement = all 设置，也不会记录包含简单语法错误的语句，因为只有在完成基本分析以确定语句类型之后，才会发出日志消息。在扩展查询协议的情况下，此设置同样不记录在执行阶段之前（即，在分析分析或计划期间）失败的语句。将 log_min_error_statement 设置为 ERROR （或更低）以记录此类语句。

trans-unit.source: Statistical correlation between physical row ordering and logical ordering of the column values. This ranges from -1 to +1. When the value is near -1 or +1, an index scan on the column will be estimated to be cheaper than when it is near zero, due to reduction of random access to the disk. (This column is null if the column data type does not have a < operator.)
trans-unit.target: 列值的物理行排序和逻辑排序之间的统计相关性。范围是-1至+1。当该值接近-1或+1时，由于减少了对磁盘的随机访问，因此估计该列上的索引扫描比接近零时便宜。（如果列数据类型没有 < 运算符，则此列为null 。）

trans-unit.source: Statistics Collector
trans-unit.target: 统计数据收集器

trans-unit.source: Statistics Information Functions
trans-unit.target: 统计信息功能

trans-unit.source: Statistics Used by the Planner
trans-unit.target: 规划师使用的统计数据

trans-unit.source: Statistics objects are created using the CREATE STATISTICS command. Creation of such an object merely creates a catalog entry expressing interest in the statistics. Actual data collection is performed by ANALYZE (either a manual command, or background auto-analyze). The collected values can be examined in the pg_statistic_ext_data catalog.
trans-unit.target: 使用CREATE STATISTICS命令创建统计对象。创建此类对象仅会创建一个表达对统计信息感兴趣的目录条目。实际数据收集是通过 ANALYZE （手动命令或后台自动分析）执行的。可以在 pg_statistic_ext_data 目录中检查收集的值。

trans-unit.source: Stats collector (process)
trans-unit.target: 统计收集器(流程)

trans-unit.source: Still, with appropriate use of expression indexes, the above query can use an index. If querying for particular items within the "tags" key is common, defining an index like this may be worthwhile:
trans-unit.target: 尽管如此，通过适当使用表达式索引，上述查询仍可以使用索引。如果在 "tags" 键中查询特定项目很常见，则定义这样的索引可能是值得的：

trans-unit.source: Stop after reading the specified log segment file.
trans-unit.target: 读取指定的日志段文件后停止。

trans-unit.source: Stop reading at the specified WAL location, instead of reading to the end of the log stream.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的WAL位置停止读取,而不是读取到日志流的末端。

trans-unit.source: Stop the server, if it's running.
trans-unit.target: 停止服务器,如果它正在运行。

trans-unit.source: Stop words are words that are very common, appear in almost every document, and have no discrimination value. Therefore, they can be ignored in the context of full text searching. For example, every English text contains words like a and the, so it is useless to store them in an index. However, stop words do affect the positions in tsvector, which in turn affect ranking:
trans-unit.target: 停用词是非常常见的词，几乎出现在每个文档中，并且没有歧视价值。因此，在全文搜索的上下文中可以忽略它们。例如，每个英文文本都包含 a 和 the 之类的词，因此将它们存储在索引中是没有用的。但是，停用词确实会影响 tsvector 中的位置，进而影响排名：

trans-unit.source: Stopping the Server
trans-unit.target: 停止服务器

trans-unit.source: Storage Parameters
trans-unit.target: 存储参数

trans-unit.source: Storage Size
trans-unit.target: 存储容量

trans-unit.source: Storage encryption can be performed at the file system level or the block level. Linux file system encryption options include eCryptfs and EncFS, while FreeBSD uses PEFS. Block level or full disk encryption options include dm-crypt + LUKS on Linux and GEOM modules geli and gbde on FreeBSD. Many other operating systems support this functionality, including Windows.
trans-unit.target: 存储加密可以在文件系统级或块级进行。Linux 文件系统加密选项包括 eCryptfs 和 EncFS,而 FreeBSD 则使用 PEFS。块级或全盘加密选项包括 Linux 上的 dm-crypt+LUKS 以及 FreeBSD 上的 GEOM 模块 geli 和 gbde。许多其他操作系统也支持这个功能,包括Windows。

trans-unit.source: Stores the file into a PostgreSQL large object. Optionally, it associates the given comment with the object. Example:
trans-unit.target: 将文件存储到一个PostgreSQL大对象中。可选地,它将给定的注释与对象相关联。例子:

trans-unit.source: Stream the write-ahead log while the backup is created. This will open a second connection to the server and start streaming the write-ahead log in parallel while running the backup. Therefore, it will use up two connections configured by the max_wal_senders parameter. As long as the client can keep up with write-ahead log received, using this mode requires no extra write-ahead logs to be saved on the master.
trans-unit.target: 创建备份时，流式传输预写日志。这将打开与服务器的第二个连接，并在运行备份时开始并行流式传输预写日志。因此，它将用完由max_wal_senders参数配置的两个连接。只要客户端可以跟上收到的预写日志，使用此模式就不需要在主数据库上保存额外的预写日志。

trans-unit.source: Stream write-ahead log data while the backup is being taken. This method will open a second connection to the server and start streaming the write-ahead log in parallel while running the backup. Therefore, it will require two replication connections not just one. As long as the client can keep up with the write-ahead log data, using this method requires no extra write-ahead logs to be saved on the source server.
trans-unit.target: 在进行备份的同时流式传输先写日志数据。此方法将打开第二个与服务器的连接,并在运行备份的同时开始并行流式传输先写日志。因此,它将需要两个复制连接,而不仅仅是一个。只要客户端能够跟上写前日志数据,使用这种方法就不需要在源服务器上保存额外的写前日志。

trans-unit.source: Streaming replication allows a standby server to stay more up-to-date than is possible with file-based log shipping. The standby connects to the primary, which streams WAL records to the standby as they're generated, without waiting for the WAL file to be filled.
trans-unit.target: 流式复制允许备用服务器保持比基于文件的日志运输更多的最新信息。备用服务器连接到主服务器,主服务器在WAL记录生成时将其流式传输到备用服务器,而无需等待WAL文件被填充。

trans-unit.source: Streaming replication and log-shipping standby servers can remain running until a later step.
trans-unit.target: 流式复制和日志转移备用服务器可以保持运行,直到以后的步骤。

trans-unit.source: Streaming replication is asynchronous by default (see Section 26.2.8), in which case there is a small delay between committing a transaction in the primary and the changes becoming visible in the standby. This delay is however much smaller than with file-based log shipping, typically under one second assuming the standby is powerful enough to keep up with the load. With streaming replication, archive_timeout is not required to reduce the data loss window.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，流复制是异步的（请参阅第26.2.8节），在这种情况下，在主数据库中提交事务与更改在备用数据库中可见之间存在很小的延迟。但是，此延迟要比基于文件的日志传送的延迟小得多，通常假设备用服务器的功能足以应付负载，通常不到一秒钟。使用流复制时，不需要 archive_timeout 可以减少数据丢失窗口。

trans-unit.source: Strictly speaking, this process is iteration not recursion, but RECURSIVE is the terminology chosen by the SQL standards committee.
trans-unit.target: 严格来说，此过程是迭代而不是递归，但是 RECURSIVE 是SQL标准委员会选择的术语。

trans-unit.source: Subtraction of dates and timestamps can also be complex. One conceptually simple way to perform subtraction is to convert each value to a number of seconds using EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ...), then subtract the results; this produces the number of seconds between the two values. This will adjust for the number of days in each month, timezone changes, and daylight saving time adjustments. Subtraction of date or timestamp values with the “-” operator returns the number of days (24-hours) and hours/minutes/seconds between the values, making the same adjustments. The age function returns years, months, days, and hours/minutes/seconds, performing field-by-field subtraction and then adjusting for negative field values. The following queries illustrate the differences in these approaches. The sample results were produced with timezone = 'US/Eastern'; there is a daylight saving time change between the two dates used:
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间戳的相减也可能很复杂。从概念上讲，执行减法的一种简单方法是使用 EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ...) 将每个值转换为秒数，然后减去结果。这将产生两个值之间的秒数。这将根据每月的天数，时区更改和夏时制进行调整。用“ - ”运算符减去日期或时间戳记值将返回天数（24小时）和小时/分钟/秒之间的值，进行相同的调整。该 age 函数返回年，月，日和小时/分钟/秒，执行逐字段减法，然后调整为负字段值。以下查询说明了这些方法的差异。样本结果是在 timezone = 'US/Eastern' 产生的；在使用的两个日期之间存在夏令时更改：

trans-unit.source: Summing all the MCFs also tells us that the total fraction of the population represented by MCVs is 0.03033333, and therefore the fraction represented by the histogram is 0.96966667 (again, there are no nulls, else we'd have to exclude them here). We can see that the value IAAAAA falls nearly at the end of the third histogram bucket. Using some rather cheesy assumptions about the frequency of different characters, the planner arrives at the estimate 0.298387 for the portion of the histogram population that is less than IAAAAA. We then combine the estimates for the MCV and non-MCV populations:
trans-unit.target: 对所有MCF求和也可以告诉我们，MCV代表的总体分数为0.03033333，因此直方图代表的分数为0.96966667（同样，没有null，否则我们必须在这里排除它们）。我们可以看到，值 IAAAAA 几乎落在第三个直方图存储桶的末尾。使用一些关于不同字符出现频率的较为俗气的假设，对于小于 IAAAAA 的直方图总体部分，计划者得出的估计值为0.298387。然后，我们将MCV和非MCV人群的估算值结合起来：

trans-unit.source: Superusers and roles with the BYPASSRLS attribute always bypass the row security system when accessing a table. Table owners normally bypass row security as well, though a table owner can choose to be subject to row security with ALTER TABLE ... FORCE ROW LEVEL SECURITY.
trans-unit.target: 具有 BYPASSRLS 属性的超级用户和角色在访问表时始终会绕过行安全系统。表所有者通常也绕过行安全性，尽管表所有者可以选择使用ALTER TABLE ... FORCE ROW LEVEL SECURITY来接受行安全性。

trans-unit.source: Superusers can always do this; ordinary roles can only do it if they are both the current owner of the object (or a member of the owning role) and a member of the new owning role.
trans-unit.target: 超级用户总是可以做到这一点;普通角色只有在他们既是对象的当前所有者(或拥有角色的成员)又是新的拥有角色的成员时才能做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Superusers can change anyone's session defaults. Roles having CREATEROLE privilege can change defaults for non-superuser roles. Ordinary roles can only set defaults for themselves. Certain configuration variables cannot be set this way, or can only be set if a superuser issues the command. Only superusers can change a setting for all roles in all databases.
trans-unit.target: 超级用户可以更改任何人的会话默认设置。具有 CREATEROLE 特权的角色可以更改非超级用户角色的默认设置。普通角色只能为其设置默认值。某些配置变量不能以这种方式设置，或者仅在超级用户发出命令时才能设置。只有超级用户才能更改所有数据库中所有角色的设置。

trans-unit.source: Support for the Serializable transaction isolation level has not yet been added to Hot Standby replication targets (described in Section 26.5). The strictest isolation level currently supported in hot standby mode is Repeatable Read. While performing all permanent database writes within Serializable transactions on the master will ensure that all standbys will eventually reach a consistent state, a Repeatable Read transaction run on the standby can sometimes see a transient state that is inconsistent with any serial execution of the transactions on the master.
trans-unit.target: 尚未将对Serializable事务隔离级别的支持添加到Hot Standby复制目标中（在26.5节中进行了介绍）。当前在热备用模式下支持的最严格的隔离级别是“可重复读取”。虽然在主服务器上执行可序列化事务中的所有永久数据库写操作将确保所有备用服务器最终都达到一致状态，但在备用服务器上运行的“可重复读取”事务有时可能会看到一个瞬态状态，该状态与服务器上事务的任何串行执行均不一致。主。

trans-unit.source: Support function number
trans-unit.target: 支持功能号

trans-unit.source: Support function numbers 1 through 10 are reserved for the BRIN internal functions, so the SQL level functions start with number 11. Support function number 11 is the main function required to build the index. It should accept two arguments with the same data type as the operator class, and return the union of them. The inclusion operator class can store union values with different data types if it is defined with the STORAGE parameter. The return value of the union function should match the STORAGE data type.
trans-unit.target: 支持功能编号1到10是为BRIN内部功能保留的，因此SQL级功能以数字11开头。支持功能编号11是构建索引所需的主要功能。它应该接受与运算符类具有相同数据类型的两个参数，并返回它们的并集。如果用 STORAGE 参数定义了包含运算符类，则可以存储具有不同数据类型的并集值。联合函数的返回值应与 STORAGE 数据类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: Support function numbers 1-10 are reserved for the BRIN internal functions, so the SQL level functions start with number 11. Support function number 11 is the main function required to build the index. It should accept two arguments with the same data type as the operator class, and return the union of them. The inclusion operator class can store union values with different data types if it is defined with the STORAGE parameter. The return value of the union function should match the STORAGE data type.
trans-unit.target: 支持函数编号1-10是为BRIN内部函数保留的，因此SQL级别函数以数字11开头。支持函数编号11是构建索引所需的主要函数。它应该接受与运算符类具有相同数据类型的两个参数，并返回它们的并集。如果用 STORAGE 参数定义了包含运算符类，则可以存储具有不同数据类型的并集值。联合函数的返回值应与 STORAGE 数据类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: Support function numbers 12 and 14 are provided to support irregularities of built-in data types. Function number 12 is used to support network addresses from different families which are not mergeable. Function number 14 is used to support empty ranges. Function number 13 is an optional but recommended one, which allows the new value to be checked before it is passed to the union function. As the BRIN framework can shortcut some operations when the union is not changed, using this function can improve index performance.
trans-unit.target: 支持功能号12和14用于支持内置数据类型的不规则性。功能号12用于支持来自不同族的网络地址,这些地址是不能合并的。功能号14用于支持空范围。函数号13是一个可选但推荐的函数,它允许在将新值传递给联合函数之前对其进行检查。由于BRIN框架在不改变联合的情况下,可以快捷地进行一些操作,所以使用这个函数可以提高索引性能。

trans-unit.source: Suppose you are storing web server access logs in a database. Most accesses originate from the IP address range of your organization but some are from elsewhere (say, employees on dial-up connections). If your searches by IP are primarily for outside accesses, you probably do not need to index the IP range that corresponds to your organization's subnet.
trans-unit.target: 假设你正在数据库中存储网络服务器的访问日志。大多数访问来自于你的组织的IP地址范围,但也有一些来自于其他地方(例如,拨号连接的员工)。如果你按IP搜索的主要是外部的访问,你可能不需要索引与你的组织的子网相对应的IP范围。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous Multimaster Replication
trans-unit.target: 同步多主站复制

trans-unit.source: Synchronous Replication Support for Logical Decoding
trans-unit.target: 逻辑解码的同步复制支持

trans-unit.source: Synchronous replication is affected by this setting when synchronous_commit is set to remote_apply; every COMMIT will need to wait to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 同步复制是由当此设置影响 synchronous_commit 设为 remote_apply ; 每个 COMMIT 都需要等待申请。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous replication offers the ability to confirm that all changes made by a transaction have been transferred to one or more synchronous standby servers. This extends that standard level of durability offered by a transaction commit. This level of protection is referred to as 2-safe replication in computer science theory, and group-1-safe (group-safe and 1-safe) when synchronous_commit is set to remote_write.
trans-unit.target: 同步复制提供了确认事务所做的所有更改已转移到一个或多个同步备用服务器的能力。这扩展了事务提交所提供的标准持久性级别。这种保护级别被称为计算机科学理论2-安全复制，和组-1-安全时（组安全和1-安全） synchronous_commit 设为 remote_write 。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous replication supports one or more synchronous standby servers; transactions will wait until all the standby servers which are considered as synchronous confirm receipt of their data. The number of synchronous standbys that transactions must wait for replies from is specified in synchronous_standby_names. This parameter also specifies a list of standby names and the method (FIRST and ANY) to choose synchronous standbys from the listed ones.
trans-unit.target: 同步复制支持一台或多台同步备用服务器；事务将一直等到所有被视为同步的备用服务器确认收到其数据。同步备用从指定的事务必须等待回复的数量 synchronous_standby_names 。此参数还指定备用数据库名称列表以及从列出的备用数据库中选择同步备用数据库的方法（ FIRST 和 ANY ）。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous replication usually requires carefully planned and placed standby servers to ensure applications perform acceptably. Waiting doesn't utilize system resources, but transaction locks continue to be held until the transfer is confirmed. As a result, incautious use of synchronous replication will reduce performance for database applications because of increased response times and higher contention.
trans-unit.target: 同步复制通常需要精心规划和放置备用服务器,以确保应用程序的性能可以接受。等待并不利用系统资源,但在确认传输之前,事务锁会继续保持。因此,不谨慎地使用同步复制会因为增加响应时间和更高的争用性而降低数据库应用的性能。
